queryList.query: SELECT APY.MIS_ID ,MIS.MIS_TITLE ,MIS.START_DATE ,MIS.END_DATE ,APY.MEM_SID ,APY.APPLY_CTG ,ATFUNC_Z_GETGCODEDNM('A0001', APY.APPLY_CTG) APPLY_CTG_NM ,APY.STATUS ,ATFUNC_Z_GETGCODEDNM('A0003', APY.STATUS) STATUS_NM ,APY.RMK FROM AT_MINISTRY MIS LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT APY.* FROM AT_APPLY APY WHERE 1=1 AND APY.MIS_ID = #{misId} AND APY.MEM_SID = #{memSid} ) APY ON MIS.MIS_ID = APY.MIS_ID WHERE 1=1 AND MIS.MIS_ID = #{misId}

SELECT BSC.* ,NULL PHOTO_PATH ,FALSE DID_CHANGE_PHOTO ,ATFUNC_S_GETTEAMNM(BSC.MIS_ID, BSC.FAVOR_TEAM_ID1) FAVOR_TEAM_NM1 ,ATFUNC_S_GETTEAMNM(BSC.MIS_ID, BSC.FAVOR_TEAM_ID2) FAVOR_TEAM_NM2 FROM AT_APPLY_M_BSC BSC WHERE 1=1 AND BSC.MIS_ID = #{misId} AND BSC.MEM_SID = #{memSid}

SELECT QNA.* ,QST.COL1 COL1_Q ,QST.COL2 COL2_Q ,QST.COL3 COL3_Q ,QST.COL4 COL4_Q ,QST.COL5 COL5_Q FROM AT_APPLY_M_QNA QNA LEFT OUTER JOIN AT_APPLY_M_QST QST ON QNA.MIS_ID = QST.MIS_ID WHERE 1=1 AND QNA.MIS_ID = #{misId} AND QNA.MEM_SID = #{memSid}
